section.title: Validate each file before committing
section.p: To enable validation of each file before committing, check the Validate each file before commiting option on the Git addon's preferences page, which can be accessed as follows: from "Git" menu -> "Settings" -> "Preferences" or Git Staging -> button -> "Preferences". There must be no unstaged files, as these may affect the validation process. If validation problems are detected, then the commit operation will be stopped, a dialog to show this will appear and the problems can be viewed in the "Git pre-commit validation" tab from the "Results" area. If the option Reject commit when validation problems occur is checked, then the dialog that informs about finding validation issues will have two buttons: Commit anyway and Cancel, otherwise only Cancel. The Commit anyway button allows the commit operation to be completed even if validation issues have been found.
